GoogleSearchIdeahubV1alphaIdeaState.description: Represents idea state specific to a web property.

name.description: Unique identifier for the idea state. Format: platforms/{platform}/properties/{property}/ideaStates/{idea_state}

GoogleSearchIdeahubV1alphaTopic.description: Represents a Topic umbrella for a list of questions that a Creator may want to respond to.

name.description: Unique identifier for the topic. Format: topics/{topic}

displayName.description: String displayed to the creator indicating the name of the Topic.

uri.description: The uri the activity relates to.

topics.description: The Topic IDs for this entry. If empty, ideas should be set.

ideas.description: The Idea IDs for this entry. If empty, topics should be set.

name.description: Unique identifier for the idea activity. The name is ignored when creating an idea activity. Format: platforms/{platform}/properties/{property}/ideaActivities/{idea_activity}

enumDescriptions: An unspecified, unknown type of idea activity.
An idea activity type indicating a post has been drafted.
An idea activity type indicating a post has been published.
An idea activity type indicating a post has been deleted.
An idea activity type indicating a post has been unpublished.

nextPageToken.description: Used to fetch the next page in a subsequent request.

availableLocales.description: Locales for which ideas are available for the given Creator.

nextPageToken.description: A token that can be sent as `page_token` to retrieve the next page. If this field is omitted, there are no subsequent pages.

GoogleSearchIdeahubV1alphaListAvailableL.description: Response for whether ideas are available for a given web property on a platform, for the currently logged-in user.

locale.description: A string in BCP 47 format, without a resource prefix.

name.description: A string in BCP 47 format, prefixed with the platform and property name, and "locales/". Format: platforms/{platform}/properties/{property}/locales/{locale}

GoogleSearchIdeahubV1alphaAvailableLocal.description: Represents locales that are available for a web property.

name.description: Unique identifier for the topic state. Format: platforms/{platform}/properties/{property}/topicStates/{topic_state}

GoogleSearchIdeahubV1alphaTopicState.description: Represents topic state specific to a web property.

GoogleSearchIdeahubV1alphaIdea.description: A single Idea that we want to show the end user.

name.description: Unique identifier for the idea. Format: ideas/{ideaId}

topics.description: The Topics that match the idea.

list.description: List ideas for a given Creator and filter and sort options.

parent.description: If defined, specifies the creator for which to filter by. Format: publishers/{publisher}/properties/{property}

filter.description: Allows filtering. Supported syntax: * Filter expressions are made up of one or more restrictions. * Restrictions are implicitly combined, as if the `AND` operator was always used. The `OR` operator is currently unsupported. * Supported functions: - `saved(bool)`: If set to true, fetches only saved ideas. If set to false, fetches all except saved ideas. Can't be simultaneously used with `dismissed(bool)`. - `dismissed(bool)`: If set to true, fetches only dismissed ideas. Can't be simultaneously used with `saved(bool)`. The `false` value is currently unsupported. Examples: * `saved(true)` * `saved(false)` * `dismissed(true)` The length of this field should be no more than 500 characters.

pageSize.description: The maximum number of ideas per page. If unspecified, at most 10 ideas will be returned. The maximum value is 2000; values above 2000 will be coerced to 2000.

parent.description: Required. The parent resource where this idea activity will be created. Format: platforms/{platform}/property/{property}

list.description: Returns which locales ideas are available in for a given Creator.

pageToken.description: A page token, received from a previous `ListAvailableLocales` call. Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page. When paginating, all other parameters provided to `ListAvailableLocales` must match the call that provided the page token.

pageSize.description: The maximum number of locales to return. The service may return fewer than this value. If unspecified, at most 100 locales will be returned. The maximum value is 100; values above 100 will be coerced to 100.

parent.description: Required. The web property to check idea availability for Format: platforms/{platform}/property/{property}

list.description: List ideas for a given Creator and filter and sort options.

pageSize.description: The maximum number of ideas per page. If unspecified, at most 10 ideas will be returned. The maximum value is 2000; values above 2000 will be coerced to 2000.

filter.description: Allows filtering. Supported syntax: * Filter expressions are made up of one or more restrictions. * Restrictions are implicitly combined, as if the `AND` operator was always used. The `OR` operator is currently unsupported. * Supported functions: - `saved(bool)`: If set to true, fetches only saved ideas. If set to false, fetches all except saved ideas. Can't be simultaneously used with `dismissed(bool)`. - `dismissed(bool)`: If set to true, fetches only dismissed ideas. Can't be simultaneously used with `saved(bool)`. The `false` value is currently unsupported. Examples: * `saved(true)` * `saved(false)` * `dismissed(true)` The length of this field should be no more than 500 characters.

parent.description: If defined, specifies the creator for which to filter by. Format: publishers/{publisher}/properties/{property}

updateMask.description: The list of fields to be updated.

name.description: Unique identifier for the topic state. Format: platforms/{platform}/properties/{property}/topicStates/{topic_state}

updateMask.description: The list of fields to be updated.

name.description: Unique identifier for the idea state. Format: platforms/{platform}/properties/{property}/ideaStates/{idea_state}

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.
